block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_craftin: A faster version of the Iron Auto Crafting Table
block.autoworkstations.netherite_auto_cr: Can auto craft up to a stack of an item at a time
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_furnace: Can bottle up experience gained from smelting items
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_furnace: A faster version of the Iron Auto Furnace
block.autoworkstations.auto_enchanting_t: Unobtainable XP Inside Auto Enchanting Table
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_enchant: Takes bottles of enchanting to enchant items, place bookshelves around to increase level
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_enchant: A faster version of the Iron Auto Enchanting Table
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_experie: Sucks up nearby XP orbs and bottles them up
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_experie: Has a larger range then the Iron Auto Experience Orb Vacuum
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_anvil.t: Can be used to automate combining items or renaming them
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_anvil.t: A faster version of the Iron Auto Anvil
gui.autoworkstations.auto_anvil.mode.rep: Repair the item in the first slot using the item in the second
gui.autoworkstations.auto_anvil.mode.ren: Apply the name of the item in the second slot to the item in the first.
If the item in the second slot is empty will reset the name of the item in the first slot.
Does not consume item in second slot.
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_brewing: Has separate slots for the completed potions, making it easier to automate with hoppers
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_brewing: A faster version of the Iron Auto Brewing Stand
block.autoworkstations.hopper_compatible: Can feed items in and out using hoppers or other methods
block.autoworkstations.iron_auto_experie: Emits XP orbs from bottles o' enchanting without consuming the glass
block.autoworkstations.gold_auto_experie: Faster than the Iron Auto Experience Orb Emitter
